Summary Note:
Jørgensen Friis and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Jørgensen Friis is a seasoned professional with over 19 years of experience.
He was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
Family Background: Jørgensen Friis is married to Olivia. Their children are named Andrea and Amanda.
Education Background:
Jørgensen completed his secondary education at Roskilde Katedralskole in 2000.
Jørgensen earned his degree from International Business Academy (IBA) in 2006.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 19 years, Jørgensen Friis has established himself as a key player in the industry.
At Intesa Sanpaolo Private Banking, Jørgensen Friis held the position of Financial Advisor from 2006 to 2010, developing essential skills in the field.
His subsequent role was as a Portfolio Manager at UniCredit Private Banking, where he continued to grow professionally from 2010 to 2013.
From 2013 to 2025, he served as a Wealth Manager at Banca Mediolanum S.p.A., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
He managed to save approximately 2730000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 1660000 EUR.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 2080000 EUR from his late grandmother, a renowned , in .
Client Summary: In summary, Jørgensen has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
